20134739Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic private void generateCRFlight(DataTable inDataTable)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Create data set to be consumed by crystal reportDi2015NewLine        DataSetFlight dataSetFlight = new DataSetFlight();Di2015NewLine        DataTable theDataTable = dataSetFlight.Tables.Add(("FlightData"));Di2015NewLine        theDataTable.Columns.Add("CarrID", Type.GetType("System.String"));Di2015NewLine        theDataTable.Columns.Add("ConnID", Type.GetType("System.String"));Di2015NewLine        theDataTable.Columns.Add("FlDate", Type.GetType("System.DateTime"));Di2015NewLine        theDataTable.Columns.Add("Price", Type.GetType("System.Decimal"));Di2015NewLine        theDataTable.Columns.Add("Currency", Type.GetType("System.String"));Di2015NewLine        theDataTable.Columns.Add("PlaneType", Type.GetType("System.String"));Di2015NewLine        theDataTable.Columns.Add("SeatsMax", Type.GetType("System.Int32"));Di2015NewLine        theDataTable.Columns.Add("SeatsOcc", Type.GetType("System.Int32"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int rowCounter = 0;Di2015NewLine        int numberOfRows = inDataTable.Rows.Count;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (rowCounter = 0; rowCounter < numberOfRows; rowCounter++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DataRow theDataRow = theDataTable.NewRow();Di2015NewLine            theDataRow[0] = inDataTable.Rows[rowCounter][0];Di2015NewLine            theDataRow[1] = inDataTable.Rows[rowCounter][1];Di2015NewLine            theDataRow[2] = inDataTable.Rows[rowCounter][2];Di2015NewLine            theDataRow[3] = inDataTable.Rows[rowCounter][3];Di2015NewLine            theDataRow[4] = inDataTable.Rows[rowCounter][4];Di2015NewLine            theDataRow[5] = inDataTable.Rows[rowCounter][5];Di2015NewLine            theDataRow[6] = inDataTable.Rows[rowCounter][6];Di2015NewLine            theDataTable.Rows.Add(theDataRow);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        CRFlight theCrystalReport = new CRFlight();Di2015NewLine        theCrystalReport.SetDataSource(dataSetFlight.Tables[1]);Di2015NewLine        ReportViewer theReportViewer = new ReportViewer(theCrystalReport);Di2015NewLine        theReportViewer.Show();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
20134870Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class TimeSpanExtensionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static TimeSpan TryParseTenth(string timeSpanString)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //change following line to accomodate date format if neededDi2015NewLine        timeSpanString += "0";Di2015NewLine        TimeSpan ts = new TimeSpan();Di2015NewLine        if (TimeSpan.TryParse(timeSpanString, out ts))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // recalculate from tenth of minute into secondsDi2015NewLine            float realSeconds = ts.Seconds * 60 / 100;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //final operation to correctDi2015NewLine            return ts.Subtract(new TimeSpan(0, 0, ts.Seconds - (int)realSeconds));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return TimeSpan.Zero;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20135867Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ColumnsConverter : JsonConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override bool CanConvert(Type objectType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // this converter can handle converting some JSON to a List<string>Di2015NewLine        return objectType == typeof(List<string>);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object ReadJson(JsonReader reader, Type objectType, object existingValue, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Convert an object to a flat list of strings containingDi2015NewLine        // just the property names from the object.Di2015NewLine        JObject obj = JObject.Load(reader);Di2015NewLine        return obj.Properties().Select(p => p.Name).ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool CanWrite Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        get { return false; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void WriteJson(JsonWriter writer, object value, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20135867Di2015UniqueSeparatorSet
20135867Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass SetConverter : JsonConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override bool CanConvert(Type objectType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // this converter can handle converting some JSON to a List<string>Di2015NewLine        return objectType == typeof(List<string>);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object ReadJson(JsonReader reader, Type objectType, object existingValue, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Convert an array of arrays of strings to a flat list of stringsDi2015NewLine        JArray array = JArray.Load(reader);Di2015NewLine        return array.Children<JArray>()Di2015NewLine            .SelectMany(ja => ja.Children(), (ja, jt) => jt.Value<string>()).ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool CanWriteDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return false; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void WriteJson(JsonWriter writer, object value, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20137314Di2015UniqueSeparatorif (top < numFrames)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            frame[top++] = refString[i];Di2015NewLine            fault++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine
20137314Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid LRU(int numframes,int refString[],int frames[]) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   int top = 0,fault=0;Di2015NewLine   int* count = new int[numframes];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   for(int i=0;i<refString.length;i++) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       int k = findmax(refString[i],frames,count,top,numframes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       if(k<0) {Di2015NewLine          count[top] = 0;Di2015NewLine          frames[top++] = refString[i];Di2015NewLine          fault++;   Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       else if(frames[k]!=refString[i]) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           count[k] = 0;Di2015NewLine           frames[k] = refString[i];Di2015NewLine           fault++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine      else count[k] = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     for(int j=0;j<top;j++) {Di2015NewLine          count[j]++;  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   return(fault);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint findmax(int keyframe,int frames[],int count,int top,int numframes) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     int max = 0;Di2015NewLine     for(int i=0;i<top;i++) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(frames[i]==keyframe) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine             return(i);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if(count[max]<count[i])Di2015NewLine            max = i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     if(top<numframes)Di2015NewLine           return(-1);Di2015NewLine     return(max);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20137314Di2015UniqueSeparator1. check if current requested frame is in cache and if yes then get its indexDi2015NewLine2. if frame is present then set its count to zero so as to indicate it is used very recently, higher the count the more least recently frame is used.Di2015NewLine3. if frame is not present in cache thenDi2015NewLine   a. check if cache is full if not add new frame to end of cache and increment the fault and top of cacheDi2015NewLine   b. else if chace is full then get frame with maximum count(LRU frame) and replace it with new frame and reset count to zero and increment fault.Di2015NewLine4. increment all the countsDi2015NewLine5. do 1 to 4 till end of all requestsDi2015NewLine6. output the no of faults Di2015NewLine

20137819Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool AreParenthesesBalanced(string input) {Di2015NewLine  int k = 0;Di2015NewLine  for (int i = 0; i < input.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine      if (input[i] == '(') k++;Di2015NewLine      else if (input[i] == ')'){Di2015NewLine        if(k > 0)  k--;Di2015NewLine        else return false;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return k == 0;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20138285Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Create a function delegate representing a binary operationDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="castArgsToResultOnFailure">Di2015NewLine/// If no matching operation is possible, attempt to convertDi2015NewLine/// TArg1 and TArg2 to TResult for a match? For example, there is noDi2015NewLine/// "decimal operator /(decimal, int)", but by converting TArg2 (int) toDi2015NewLine/// TResult (decimal) a match is found.Di2015NewLine/// </param>Di2015NewLine/// <typeparam name="TArg1">The first parameter type</typeparam>Di2015NewLine/// <typeparam name="TArg2">The second parameter type</typeparam>Di2015NewLine/// <typeparam name="TResult">The return type</typeparam>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="body">Body factory</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>Compiled function delegate</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static Func<TArg1, TArg2, TResult> CreateExpression<TArg1, TArg2, TResult>(Di2015NewLine        Func<Expression, Expression, BinaryExpression> body, bool castArgsToResultOnFailure)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ParameterExpression lhs = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TArg1), "lhs");Di2015NewLine    ParameterExpression rhs = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TArg2), "rhs");Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Expression.Lambda<Func<TArg1, TArg2, TResult>>(body(lhs, rhs), lhs, rhs).Compile();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (InvalidOperationException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (castArgsToResultOnFailure && !(         // if we show retryDi2015NewLine                            typeof(TArg1) == typeof(TResult) &&  // and the args aren'tDi2015NewLine                            typeof(TArg2) == typeof(TResult)))Di2015NewLine            { // already "TValue, TValue, TValue"...Di2015NewLine                // convert both lhs and rhs to TResult (as appropriate)Di2015NewLine                Expression castLhs = typeof(TArg1) == typeof(TResult) ?Di2015NewLine                                (Expression)lhs :Di2015NewLine                                (Expression)Expression.Convert(lhs, typeof(TResult));Di2015NewLine                Expression castRhs = typeof(TArg2) == typeof(TResult) ?Di2015NewLine                                (Expression)rhs :Di2015NewLine                                (Expression)Expression.Convert(rhs, typeof(TResult));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return Expression.Lambda<Func<TArg1, TArg2, TResult>>(Di2015NewLine                        body(castLhs, castRhs), lhs, rhs).Compile();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else throw;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string msg = ex.Message; // avoid capture of ex itselfDi2015NewLine        return delegate { throw new InvalidOperationException(msg); };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20138285Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpression.Lambda<Func<TArg1, TArg2, TResult>>(body(lhs, rhs), lhs, rhs).Compile();

20138922Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic int[] ToIntPercents(double[] values)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int[] results = new int[values.Length];Di2015NewLine    double error = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < values.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double val = values[i] * 100;Di2015NewLine        int percent = (int)Math.Round(val + error);Di2015NewLine        error += val - percent;Di2015NewLine        if (Math.Abs(error) >= 0.5)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int sign = Math.Sign(error);Di2015NewLine            percent += sign;Di2015NewLine            error -= sign;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        results[i] = percent;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return results;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20141188Di2015UniqueSeparator    private readonly ushort[] iso8859_2 = {Di2015NewLine        0x00A0, 0x0104, 0x02D8, 0x0141, 0x00A4, 0x013D, 0x015A, 0x00A7, 0x00A8, 0x0160, Di2015NewLine        0x015E, 0x0164, 0x0179, 0x00AD, 0x017D, 0x017B, 0x00B0, 0x0105, 0x02DB, 0x0142, Di2015NewLine        0x00B4, 0x013E, 0x015B, 0x02C7, 0x00B8, 0x0161, 0x015F, 0x0165, 0x017A, 0x02DD, Di2015NewLine        0x017E, 0x017C, 0x0154, 0x00C1, 0x00C2, 0x0102, 0x00C4, 0x0139, 0x0106, 0x00C7, Di2015NewLine        0x010C, 0x00C9, 0x0118, 0x00CB, 0x011A, 0x00CD, 0x00CE, 0x010E, 0x0110, 0x0143, Di2015NewLine        0x0147, 0x00D3, 0x00D4, 0x0150, 0x00D6, 0x00D7, 0x0158, 0x016E, 0x00DA, 0x0170, Di2015NewLine        0x00DC, 0x00DD, 0x0162, 0x00DF, 0x0155, 0x00E1, 0x00E2, 0x0103, 0x00E4, 0x013A, Di2015NewLine        0x0107, 0x00E7, 0x010D, 0x00E9, 0x0119, 0x00EB, 0x011B, 0x00ED, 0x00EE, 0x010F, Di2015NewLine        0x0111, 0x0144, 0x0148, 0x00F3, 0x00F4, 0x0151, 0x00F6, 0x00F7, 0x0159, 0x016F, Di2015NewLine        0x00FA, 0x0171, 0x00FC, 0x00FD, 0x0163, 0x02D9 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string decodeXML(string xml)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] data = Convert.FromBase64String(xml);Di2015NewLine        char[] decoded = new char[data.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < data.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            if (data[i] < 128)Di2015NewLine                decoded[i] = (char)data[i];Di2015NewLine            else if (data[i] < 0xA0)Di2015NewLine                decoded[i] = '\\0';Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                decoded[i] = (char)iso8859_2[data[i] - 0xA0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new string(decoded);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

20142418Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Dictionary<object, object> GetDetails(Type Class)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Null checkDi2015NewLine    if (null == Class)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("Class");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MvcDemoDBEntities db = new MvcDemoDBEntities();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Get the generic dictionary type:Di2015NewLine    Type DictType = typeof(Dictionary<,>).MakeGenericType(Class, typeof(object));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Create the dictionary object:Di2015NewLine    object dict = Activator.CreateInstance(typeof(DictType));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Get the Add method:Di2015NewLine    var add = DictType.GetMethod("Add", new Type[]{Class, typeof(object)});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var data = (from h in db.PeopleDi2015NewLine            select h).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var item in data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //add to the dictionary:Di2015NewLine        add.Invoke(dict, new object[]{item, true});Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return dict;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20143427Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Adds a sequence of parameters to an existing parameter collectionDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <typeparam name="T">Type of parameter values</typeparam>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="parameters">Existing parameter collection</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="pattern">Name pattern of parameters. Must be a valid <see langword="int"/> format string</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="parameterType">Database type of parameters</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="length">Length of parameter. 0 for numeric parameters</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="values">Sequence of values</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>Comma separated string of parameter names</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static string AddParameters<T>(SqlParameterCollection parameters,Di2015NewLine                                      string pattern,Di2015NewLine                                      SqlDbType parameterType,Di2015NewLine                                      int length,Di2015NewLine                                      IEnumerable<T> values) {Di2015NewLine    if (parameters == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("parameters");Di2015NewLine    if (pattern == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("pattern");Di2015NewLine    if (values == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("values");Di2015NewLine    if (!pattern.StartsWith("@", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Pattern must start with '@'");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var parameterNames = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var item in values) {Di2015NewLine        var parameterName = parameterNames.Count.ToString(pattern, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine        parameterNames.Add(parameterName);Di2015NewLine        parameters.Add(parameterName, parameterType, length).Value = item;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return string.Join(",", parameterNames.ToArray());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20146256Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Image ExtractBaseImage(Bitmap resultImage, Bitmap blendImage) {Di2015NewLine    Bitmap bm = new Bitmap(resultImage.Width, resultImage.Height);Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < resultImage.Width; i++) {Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < resultImage.Height; j++) {Di2015NewLine           Color resultColor = resultImage.GetPixel(i, j);Di2015NewLine           Color blendColor = blendImage.GetPixel(i, j);Di2015NewLine           if (blendColor.A == 0) bm.SetPixel(i, j, resultColor);Di2015NewLine           else if(blendColor != resultColor){Di2015NewLine              float opacity = blendColor.A / 255f;Di2015NewLine              int r = Math.Max(0,Math.Min(255,(int) ((resultColor.R - (opacity) * blendColor.R) / (1-opacity))));Di2015NewLine              int g = Math.Max(0,Math.Min(255,(int)((resultColor.G - (opacity) * blendColor.G) / (1-opacity))));Di2015NewLine              int b = Math.Max(0,Math.Min(255,(int)((resultColor.B - (opacity) * blendColor.B) / (1-opacity))));                        Di2015NewLine              bm.SetPixel(i,j,Color.FromArgb(r,g,b));Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return bm;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20150363Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static bool IsAssignableToGenericType(Type givenType, Type genericType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var interfaceTypes = givenType.GetInterfaces();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var it in interfaceTypes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (it.IsGenericType && it.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == genericType)Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (givenType.IsGenericType && givenType.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == genericType)Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Type baseType = givenType.BaseType;Di2015NewLine        if (baseType == null) return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return IsAssignableToGenericType(baseType, genericType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

20155077Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate int BytesToInt(byte[] byteArray)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Start with zeroDi2015NewLine    int result = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var b in byteArray)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // For each item in the array, first left-shift the result one bitDi2015NewLine        result <<= 1;Di2015NewLine        // If the byte is non-zero, set the lowest bit in the resultDi2015NewLine        if (b != 0) result |= 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20158103Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class JsonHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static JArray ToJArray(this JToken token, string itemProperty)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (token != null && token.Type != JTokenType.Null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            token = token[itemProperty];Di2015NewLine            if (token != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (token.Type == JTokenType.Array)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return (JArray)token;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return new JArray(token);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return new JArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20158722Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class Mapper<TEntity> where TEntity : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly Dictionary<string, Action<TEntity, object>> _propertyMappers = new Dictionary<string, Action<TEntity, object>>();Di2015NewLine        private Func<TEntity> _entityFactory;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Mapper<TEntity> ConstructUsing(Func<TEntity> entityFactory)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _entityFactory = entityFactory;Di2015NewLine            return this;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Mapper<TEntity> Map<TProperty>(Expression<Func<TEntity, TProperty>> memberExpression, string bloombergFieldName, Expression<Func<object, TProperty>> converter)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var converterInput = Expression.Parameter(typeof(object), "converterInput");Di2015NewLine            var invokeConverter = Expression.Invoke(converter, converterInput);Di2015NewLine            var assign = Expression.Assign(memberExpression.Body, invokeConverter);Di2015NewLine            var mapAction = Expression.Lambda<Action<TEntity, object>>(Di2015NewLine                assign, memberExpression.Parameters[0], converterInput).Compile();Di2015NewLine            _propertyMappers[bloombergFieldName] = mapAction;Di2015NewLine            return this;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public TEntity MapFrom(Dictionary<string, object> bloombergDict)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var instance = _entityFactory();Di2015NewLine            foreach (var entry in bloombergDict)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _propertyMappers[entry.Key](instance, entry.Value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return instance;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class StockDataResultDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public decimal LastPrice { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public DateTime SettlementDate { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public decimal EPS { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Main(params string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var mapper = new Mapper<StockDataResult>()Di2015NewLine            .ConstructUsing(() => new StockDataResult())Di2015NewLine            .Map(x => x.Name, "NAME", p => (string)p)Di2015NewLine            .Map(x => x.LastPrice, "PX_LAST", p => Convert.ToDecimal((float)p))Di2015NewLine            .Map(x => x.SettlementDate, "SETTLE_DT", p => DateTime.ParseExact((string)p, "MM/dd/yyyy", null));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var dctBloombergStockData = new Dictionary<string, object>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            { "NAME", "IBM" },Di2015NewLine            {  "PX_LAST", 181.30f },Di2015NewLine            { "SETTLE_DT", "11/25/2013" } // This is Datetime valueDi2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        var myStockResult = mapper.MapFrom(dctBloombergStockData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(myStockResult.Name);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(myStockResult.LastPrice);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(myStockResult.SettlementDate);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20159257Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass MainClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public MainClass()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bot = new Bot();Di2015NewLine        botDataProducer = BotDataProducer();Di2015NewLine        dataQueue = new BlockingCollection<BotData>();Di2015NewLine        consumer = Task.Factory.Run(() => ProcessData, TaskCreationOptions.LongRunning);Di2015NewLine        producer = Task.Factory.Run(() => GenerateData, TaskCreationOptions.LongRunning);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    BlockingCollection<BotData> dataQueue;Di2015NewLine    Task consumer;Di2015NewLine    Task producer;Di2015NewLine    Bot bot;Di2015NewLine    BotDataProducer botDataProducer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ProcessData()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //blocks the thread when there is no data, automatically wakes up when data is added.Di2015NewLine        foreach(var data in dataQueue.GetConsumingEnumerable())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bot.Refresh(data);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void GenerateData()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Assume Next() returns "false" when there will be no more data to processDi2015NewLine        // and blocks when there is no data currently but more could come.Di2015NewLine        while(botDataProducer.Next())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dataQueue.Add(botDataProducer.Data);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //This allows the foreach loop in the other thread to exit when the queue is empty.Di2015NewLine        dataQueue.CompleteAdding();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20159887Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class BufferedIterator<T> : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<T> buffer = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine    IEnumerator<T> iterator;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public BufferedIterator(IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        iterator = source.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T GetItemAt(int index)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (buffer.Count > index) // if item is bufferedDi2015NewLine            return buffer[index]; // return itDi2015NewLine        // or fill buffer with next itemsDi2015NewLine        while(iterator.MoveNext() && buffer.Count <= index)        Di2015NewLine            buffer.Add(iterator.Current);Di2015NewLine        // if we have read all file, but buffer has not enough itemsDi2015NewLine        if (buffer.Count <= index)Di2015NewLine            throw new IndexOutOfRangeException(); // throwDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return buffer[index]; // otherwise return required itemDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       if (iterator != null)Di2015NewLine           iterator.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20160475Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar handler1 = new LicenseHandler((l, u) => l.IsEnabled && u.IsActive, Action1);Di2015NewLinevar handler2 = new LicenseHandler((l, u) => !l.IsEnabled && u.IsActive, Action2);Di2015NewLinevar handler3 = new LicenseHandler((l, u) => !l.IsEnabled && u.IsLocked, Action3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinehandler1.SetNext(handler2.SetNext(handler3));Di2015NewLine

20160475Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class LicenseHandlerBuilderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private LicenseHandler root;Di2015NewLine    private LicenseHandler current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private LicenseHandlerBuilder() { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static LicenseHandlerBuilder CreateHandler(Di2015NewLine        Func<GroupLicense, User, bool> predicate, Action action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var builder = new LicenseHandlerBuilder();Di2015NewLine        builder.root = new LicenseHandler(predicate, action);Di2015NewLine        builder.current = builder.root;Di2015NewLine        return builder;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public LicenseHandlerBuilder WithNext(Di2015NewLine        Func<GroupLicense, User, bool> predicate, Action action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var next = new LicenseHandler(predicate, action);Di2015NewLine        current.SetNext(next);Di2015NewLine        current = next;Di2015NewLine        return this;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public LicenseHandler Build()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return root;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20161153Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine    int length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // We use TryParse to make sure it is a number, otherwiseDi2015NewLine    // we tell the user and return;.Di2015NewLine    if (!int.TryParse(textBox2.Text, out length)) {Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show("Not a number!");Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Make a random stringDi2015NewLine    string myString = RandomString(length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Show it in the text boxDi2015NewLine    textBox1.Text = myString;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ... and in the listboxDi2015NewLine    listBox1.Items.Add(myString);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20161153Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring RandomString(int length) {Di2015NewLine    string options = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ1234567890!#%&/()=?";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    StringBuilder str = new StringBuilder(length);Di2015NewLine    Random random = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add the characters one by oneDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < length; i++) {Di2015NewLine        // Get a random index in our character options string.Di2015NewLine        int randomIndex = random.Next(options.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add the random characterDi2015NewLine        str.Append(options[randomIndex]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Make a string of the StringBuilder and return it.Di2015NewLine    return str.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20167543Di2015UniqueSeparatorDataTable tblCSV = new DataTable("CSV");Di2015NewLinevar fileInfo = new FileInfo(fullPath);Di2015NewLinevar encoding = Encoding.Default;Di2015NewLineint headerIndex = 0;Di2015NewLineusing (var reader = new System.IO.StreamReader(fileInfo.FullName, encoding))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; // noneDi2015NewLine    Char delimiter = ',';Di2015NewLine    using (var csv = new CsvReader(reader, true, delimiter, quotingCharacter, escapeCharacter, commentCharacter, ValueTrimmingOptions.All))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        csv.MissingFieldAction = MissingFieldAction.ParseError;Di2015NewLine        csv.DefaultParseErrorAction = ParseErrorAction.RaiseEvent;Di2015NewLine        csv.ParseError += csv_ParseError; // csvTable_FillError-> the method that handles this errorDi2015NewLine        } catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // logging Di2015NewLine            throw;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid csv_ParseError(object sender, ParseErrorEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // if the error is that a field is missing, then skip to next lineDi2015NewLine    if (e.Error is MissingFieldCsvException)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Log.Write(e.Error, "--MISSING FIELD ERROR OCCURRED!" + Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLine        e.Action = ParseErrorAction.AdvanceToNextLine;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (e.Error is MalformedCsvException)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Log.Write(e.Error, "--MALFORMED CSV ERROR OCCURRED!" + Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLine        e.Action = ParseErrorAction.AdvanceToNextLine;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Log.Write(e.Error, "--UNKNOWN PARSE ERROR OCCURRED!" + Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLine        e.Action = ParseErrorAction.AdvanceToNextLine;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // logDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid csvTable_FillError(object sender, FillErrorEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // You can use the e.Errors value to determine exactly what went wrong.Di2015NewLine    if (e.Errors.GetType() == typeof(System.FormatException))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // logDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Setting e.Continue to True tells the LoadDi2015NewLine    // method to continue trying. Setting it to FalseDi2015NewLine    // indicates that an error has occurred, and the Di2015NewLine    // Load method raises the exception that got you here.Di2015NewLine    e.Continue = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string errors = string.Join(Environment.NewLine, e.Errors);Di2015NewLine    // logDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20170479Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Collections.Concurrent;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class EventAggregatorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly ConcurrentDictionary<Type, List<Subscriber>> subscribers =Di2015NewLine        new ConcurrentDictionary<Type, List<Subscriber>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Subscribe<TMessage>(Action<TMessage> handler)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (handler == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("handler");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var messageType = typeof(TMessage);Di2015NewLine        var handlers = this.subscribers.GetOrAdd(messageType, key => new List<Subscriber>());Di2015NewLine        lock(handlers)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            handlers.Add(new Subscriber(handler));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Publish(object message)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (message == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("message");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var messageType = message.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<Subscriber> handlers;Di2015NewLine        if (this.subscribers.TryGetValue(messageType, out handlers))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Subscriber[] tmpHandlers;Di2015NewLine            lock(handlers)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tmpHandlers = handlers.ToArray();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var handler in tmpHandlers)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!handler.Invoke(message))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    lock(handlers)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        handlers.Remove(handler);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class SubscriberDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly WeakReference reference;Di2015NewLine        private readonly Delegate method;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Subscriber(Delegate subscriber)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var target = subscriber.Target;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (target != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // An instance method. Capture the target in a WeakReference.Di2015NewLine                // Construct a new delegate that does not have a target;Di2015NewLine                this.reference = new WeakReference(target);Di2015NewLine                var messageType = subscriber.Method.GetParameters()[0].ParameterType;Di2015NewLine                var delegateType = typeof(Action<,>).MakeGenericType(target.GetType(), messageType);Di2015NewLine                this.method = Delegate.CreateDelegate(delegateType, subscriber.Method);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // It is a static method, so there is no associated target. Di2015NewLine                // Hold a strong reference to the delegate.Di2015NewLine                this.reference = null;Di2015NewLine                this.method = subscriber;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Debug.Assert(this.method.Target == null, "The delegate has a strong reference to the target.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool IsAliveDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // If the reference is null it was a Static methodDi2015NewLine                // and therefore is always "Alive".Di2015NewLine                if (this.reference == null)Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return this.reference.IsAlive;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool Invoke(object message)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            object target = null;Di2015NewLine            if (reference != null)Di2015NewLine                target = reference.Target;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!IsAlive)Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (target != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.method.DynamicInvoke(target, message);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {   Di2015NewLine                this.method.DynamicInvoke(message);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return true;                Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20170479Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var agg = new EventAggregator();Di2015NewLine        var test = new Test();Di2015NewLine        agg.Subscribe<Message>(test.Handler);Di2015NewLine        agg.Subscribe<Message>(StaticHandler);Di2015NewLine        agg.Publish(new Message() { Data = "Start test" });Di2015NewLine        GC.KeepAlive(test);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for(int i = 0; i < 10; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] b = new byte[1000000]; // allocate some memoryDi2015NewLine            agg.Publish(new Message() { Data = i.ToString() });Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(GC.CollectionCount(2));Di2015NewLine            GC.KeepAlive(b); // force the allocator to allocate b (if not in Debug).Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        GC.Collect();Di2015NewLine        agg.Publish(new Message() { Data = "End test" });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void StaticHandler(Message m)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Static Handler: {0}", m.Data);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public void Handler(Message m)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Instance Handler: {0}", m.Data);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MessageDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Data { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20173011Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var arrayBlessings = new int[]{1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6};Di2015NewLine    var arrayGameBlessings = new int[5];Di2015NewLine    var rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < arrayGameBlessings.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int bless = rnd.Next(arrayBlessings.Length);Di2015NewLine        arrayGameBlessings[i] = arrayBlessings[bless];Di2015NewLine        arrayBlessings = arrayBlessings.Where(w => w != arrayBlessings[bless]).ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(arrayBlessings);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(arrayGameBlessings);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20173011Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const int amount_to_deal = 5;Di2015NewLine    var arrayBlessings = new List<int>{1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6};Di2015NewLine    var arrayGameBlessings = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine    var rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < amount_to_deal; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int bless = rnd.Next(arrayBlessings.Count);Di2015NewLine        arrayGameBlessings.Add(arrayBlessings[bless]);Di2015NewLine        arrayBlessings.RemoveAt(bless);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(arrayBlessings);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(arrayGameBlessings);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20173391Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static byte[] GeneratePdf(Dictionary<String, String> formKeys, String pdfPath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var templatePath = System.Web.HttpContext.Current.Server.MapPath(pdfPath);Di2015NewLine        var reader = new PdfReader(templatePath);Di2015NewLine        var outStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine        var stamper = new PdfStamper(reader, outStream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var form = stamper.AcroFields;Di2015NewLine        form.GenerateAppearances = true; //Added this line, fixed my problemDi2015NewLine        var fieldKeys = form.Fields.Keys;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (KeyValuePair<String, String> pair in formKeys)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (fieldKeys.Any(f => f == pair.Key))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                form.SetField(pair.Key, pair.Value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        stamper.Close();Di2015NewLine        reader.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return flattenPdf(outStream.ToArray());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

20181436Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static double[] MatrixProduct(this double[][] matrixA,Di2015NewLine    double[] vectorB)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int aRows=matrixA.Length; int aCols=matrixA[0].Length;Di2015NewLine    int bRows=vectorB.Length;Di2015NewLine    if (aCols!=bRows)Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception("Non-conformable matrices in MatrixProduct");Di2015NewLine    double[] result=new double[aRows];Di2015NewLine    for (int i=0; i<aRows; ++i) // each row of ADi2015NewLine        for (int k=0; k<aCols; ++k)Di2015NewLine            result[i]+=matrixA[i][k]*vectorB[k];Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static double[][] MatrixProduct(this double[][] matrixA,Di2015NewLine    double[][] matrixB)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int aRows=matrixA.Length; int aCols=matrixA[0].Length;Di2015NewLine    int bRows=matrixB.Length; int bCols=matrixB[0].Length;Di2015NewLine    if (aCols!=bRows)Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception("Non-conformable matrices in MatrixProduct");Di2015NewLine    double[][] result=MatrixCreate(aRows, bCols);Di2015NewLine    for (int i=0; i<aRows; ++i) // each row of ADi2015NewLine        for (int j=0; j<bCols; ++j) // each col of BDi2015NewLine            for (int k=0; k<aCols; ++k)Di2015NewLine                result[i][j]+=matrixA[i][k]*matrixB[k][j];Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static double[][] MatrixCreate(int rows, int cols)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // creates a matrix initialized to all 0.0s  Di2015NewLine    // do error checking here?  Di2015NewLine    double[][] result=new double[rows][];Di2015NewLine    for (int i=0; i<rows; ++i)Di2015NewLine        result[i]=new double[cols];Di2015NewLine    // auto init to 0.0  Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20182571Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Stopwatch _timer = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLineprivate BackgroundWorker _worker;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void btnStop_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    CancelExistingBackgroundWorker();Di2015NewLine    _timer.Stop();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void btnStart_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    CancelExistingBackgroundWorker();Di2015NewLine    _timer.Reset();Di2015NewLine    UpdateLabel(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    _worker = new BackgroundWorker() { WorkerSupportsCancellation = true };Di2015NewLine    _worker.DoWork += (a, b) => Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        while (true) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ((a as BackgroundWorker).CancellationPending) return;Di2015NewLine            ThreadSafeUpdateLabel();Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(100);Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var soundPlayer = new SoundPlayer("wavfile.wav");Di2015NewLine    soundPlayer.PlaySync();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    _timer.Start();Di2015NewLine    _worker.RunWorkerAsync();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void ThreadSafeUpdateLabel()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (lblElapsed.InvokeRequired)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lblElapsed.Invoke(new Action(() => ThreadSafeUpdateLabel()));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        UpdateLabel(_timer.Elapsed.TotalSeconds);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void UpdateLabel(double seconds)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    lblElapsed.Text = seconds.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void CancelExistingBackgroundWorker()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (_worker != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _worker.CancelAsync();Di2015NewLine        _worker.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20182830Di2015UniqueSeparator// must be compiled with /UNSAFEDi2015NewLine// get an image to draw on and convert it to our chosen formatDi2015NewLineBitmapSource srcImage = JpegBitmapDecoder.Create(File.Open("img13.jpg", FileMode.Open),Di2015NewLine    BitmapCreateOptions.None, BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad).Frames[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (srcImage.Format != PixelFormats.Bgra32)Di2015NewLine    srcImage = new FormatConvertedBitmap(srcImage, PixelFormats.Bgra32, null, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// get a writable bitmap of that imageDi2015NewLinevar wbitmap = new WriteableBitmap(srcImage);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint width = wbitmap.PixelWidth;Di2015NewLineint height = wbitmap.PixelHeight;Di2015NewLineint stride = wbitmap.BackBufferStride;Di2015NewLineint bytesPerPixel = (wbitmap.Format.BitsPerPixel + 7) / 8;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinewbitmap.Lock();Di2015NewLinebyte* pImgData = (byte*)wbitmap.BackBuffer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// set alpha to transparent for any pixel with red < 0x88 and invert othersDi2015NewLineint cRowStart = 0;Di2015NewLineint cColStart = 0;Di2015NewLinefor (int row = 0; row < height; row++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    cColStart = cRowStart;Di2015NewLine    for (int col = 0; col < width; col++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte* bPixel = pImgData + cColStart;Di2015NewLine        UInt32* iPixel = (UInt32*)bPixel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (bPixel[2 /* bgRa */] < 0x44)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // set to 50% transparentDi2015NewLine            bPixel[3 /* bgrA */] = 0x7f;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // invert but maintain alphaDi2015NewLine            *iPixel = *iPixel ^ 0x00ffffff;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        cColStart += bytesPerPixel;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    cRowStart += stride;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinewbitmap.Unlock();Di2015NewLine// if you are going across threads, you will need to additionally freeze the sourceDi2015NewLinewbitmap.Freeze();Di2015NewLine
20182830Di2015UniqueSeparator// draw rectanglesDi2015NewLineint width = 640, height = 480, bytesperpixel = 4;Di2015NewLineint stride = width * bytesperpixel;Di2015NewLinebyte[] imgdata = new byte[width * height * bytesperpixel];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint rectDim = 40;Di2015NewLineUInt32 darkcolorPixel = 0xffaaaaaa;Di2015NewLineUInt32 lightColorPixel = 0xffeeeeee;Di2015NewLineUInt32[] intPixelData = new UInt32[width * height];Di2015NewLinefor (int row = 0; row < height; row++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int col = 0; col < width; col++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        intPixelData[row * width + col] = ((col / rectDim) % 2) != ((row / rectDim) % 2) ?Di2015NewLine            lightColorPixel : darkcolorPixel;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineBuffer.BlockCopy(intPixelData, 0, imgdata, 0, imgdata.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// compose the BitmapImageDi2015NewLinevar bsCheckerboard = BitmapSource.Create(width, height, 96, 96, PixelFormats.Bgra32, null, imgdata, stride);Di2015NewLine
20182830Di2015UniqueSeparator// draw using byte arrayDi2015NewLineint width = 640, height = 480, bytesperpixel = 4;Di2015NewLineint stride = width * bytesperpixel;Di2015NewLinebyte[] imgdata = new byte[width * height * bytesperpixel];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// draw a gradient from red to green from top to bottom (R00 -> ff; Gff -> 00)Di2015NewLine// draw a gradient of alpha from left to rightDi2015NewLine// Blue constant at 00Di2015NewLinefor (int row = 0; row < height; row++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int col = 0; col < width; col++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // BGRADi2015NewLine        imgdata[row * stride + col * 4 + 0] = 0;Di2015NewLine        imgdata[row * stride + col * 4 + 1] = Convert.ToByte((1 - (col / (float)width)) * 0xff);Di2015NewLine        imgdata[row * stride + col * 4 + 2] = Convert.ToByte((col / (float)width) * 0xff);Di2015NewLine        imgdata[row * stride + col * 4 + 3] = Convert.ToByte((row / (float)height) * 0xff);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinevar gradient = BitmapSource.Create(width, height, 96, 96, PixelFormats.Bgra32, null, imgdata, stride);Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override long PositionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return baseStream.Position; }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            baseStream.Position = value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            twLog.WriteLine(string.Format("Set position to {0}", value));Di2015NewLine            twLog.Flush();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int Read(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var bRead = baseStream.Read(buffer, offset, count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (bRead > 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            twLog.WriteLine(string.Format("Read {0} bytes from stream: {1}\\r\\n{2}", bRead,Di2015NewLine                getText(buffer, offset, bRead),Di2015NewLine                Convert.ToBase64String(buffer, offset, bRead, Base64FormattingOptions.InsertLineBreaks)));Di2015NewLine            twLog.Flush();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            twLog.WriteLine(string.Format("Read {0} bytes from stream", bRead));Di2015NewLine            twLog.Flush();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return bRead;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string getText(byte[] buffer, int offset, int bRead)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return baseEncoding.GetString(buffer, offset, bRead);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return "{ERROR: Could not convert to text}";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override long Seek(long offset, SeekOrigin origin)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var newpos = baseStream.Seek(offset, origin);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        twLog.WriteLine(string.Format("Seeked to {0} relative to {1}. 20184265Di2015UniqueSeparatorn.next == null
20184265Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool add(int e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (head == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        head = new Node { element = e };Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return add(head, e);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate bool add(Node n, int e) {Di2015NewLine    if (n.element == e)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (n.next == null) {Di2015NewLine        n.next = new Node { element = e };Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return add(n.next, e);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20184265Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool add(int e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (head == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        head = new Node { element = e };Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (head.element == e)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Node n = head;Di2015NewLine    while (n.next != null) {Di2015NewLine        if (n.element == e)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        n = n.next;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    n.next = new Node { element = e };Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20188424Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace PoshHttpDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class ProxiesDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static bool UnsetProxy()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return SetProxy(null, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public static bool SetProxy(string strProxy)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return SetProxy(strProxy, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static bool SetProxy(string strProxy, string exceptions)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            InternetPerConnOptionList list = new InternetPerConnOptionList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int optionCount = string.IsNullOrEmpty(strProxy) ? 1 : (string.IsNullOrEmpty(exceptions) ? 2 : 3);Di2015NewLine            InternetConnectionOption[] options = new InternetConnectionOption[optionCount];Di2015NewLine            // USE a proxy server ...Di2015NewLine            options[0].m_Option = PerConnOption.INTERNET_PER_CONN_FLAGS;Di2015NewLine            options[0].m_Value.m_Int = (int)((optionCount < 2) ? PerConnFlags.PROXY_TYPE_DIRECT : (PerConnFlags.PROXY_TYPE_DIRECT | PerConnFlags.PROXY_TYPE_PROXY));Di2015NewLine            // use THIS proxy serverDi2015NewLine            if (optionCount > 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                options[1].m_Option = PerConnOption.INTERNET_PER_CONN_PROXY_SERVER;Di2015NewLine                options[1].m_Value.m_StringPtr = Marshal.StringToHGlobalAuto(strProxy);Di2015NewLine                // except for these addresses ...Di2015NewLine                if (optionCount > 2)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    options[2].m_Option = PerConnOption.INTERNET_PER_CONN_PROXY_BYPASS;Di2015NewLine                    options[2].m_Value.m_StringPtr = Marshal.StringToHGlobalAuto(exceptions);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // default stuffDi2015NewLine            list.dwSize = Marshal.SizeOf(list);Di2015NewLine            list.szConnection = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine            list.dwOptionCount = options.Length;Di2015NewLine            list.dwOptionError = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int optSize = Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(InternetConnectionOption));Di2015NewLine            // make a pointer out of all that ...Di2015NewLine            IntPtr optionsPtr = Marshal.AllocCoTaskMem(optSize * options.Length);Di2015NewLine            // copy the array over into that spot in memory ...Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < options.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                IntPtr opt = new IntPtr(optionsPtr.ToInt32() + (i * optSize));Di2015NewLine                Marshal.StructureToPtr(options[i], opt, false);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            list.options = optionsPtr;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // and then make a pointer out of the whole listDi2015NewLine            IntPtr ipcoListPtr = Marshal.AllocCoTaskMem((Int32)list.dwSize);Di2015NewLine            Marshal.StructureToPtr(list, ipcoListPtr, false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // and finally, call the API method!Di2015NewLine            int returnvalue = NativeMethods.InternetSetOption(IntPtr.Zero,Di2015NewLine                                                              InternetOption.INTERNET_OPTION_PER_CONNECTION_OPTION,Di2015NewLine                                                              ipcoListPtr, list.dwSize) ? -1 : 0;Di2015NewLine            if (returnvalue == 0)Di2015NewLine            {  // get the error codes, they might be helpfulDi2015NewLine                returnvalue = Marshal.GetLastWin32Error();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // FREE the data ASAPDi2015NewLine            Marshal.FreeCoTaskMem(optionsPtr);Di2015NewLine            Marshal.FreeCoTaskMem(ipcoListPtr);Di2015NewLine            if (returnvalue > 0)Di2015NewLine            {  // throw the error codes, they might be helpfulDi2015NewLine                throw new Win32Exception(Marshal.GetLastWin32Error());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return (returnvalue < 0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region WinInet structuresDi2015NewLine   [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential, CharSet = CharSet.Auto)]Di2015NewLine   public struct InternetPerConnOptionListDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      public int dwSize;               // size of the INTERNET_PER_CONN_OPTION_LIST structDi2015NewLine      public IntPtr szConnection;         // connection name to set/query optionsDi2015NewLine      public int dwOptionCount;        // number of options to set/queryDi2015NewLine      public int dwOptionError;           // on error, which option failedDi2015NewLine      //[MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.)]Di2015NewLine      public IntPtr options;Di2015NewLine   };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential, CharSet = CharSet.Auto)]Di2015NewLine   public struct InternetConnectionOptionDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      static readonly int Size;Di2015NewLine      public PerConnOption m_Option;Di2015NewLine      public InternetConnectionOptionValue m_Value;Di2015NewLine      static InternetConnectionOption()Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         InternetConnectionOption.Size = Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(InternetConnectionOption));Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Nested TypesDi2015NewLine      [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Explicit)]Di2015NewLine      public struct InternetConnectionOptionValueDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         // FieldsDi2015NewLine         [FieldOffset(0)]Di2015NewLine         public System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FILETIME m_FileTime;Di2015NewLine         [FieldOffset(0)]Di2015NewLine         public int m_Int;Di2015NewLine         [FieldOffset(0)]Di2015NewLine         public IntPtr m_StringPtr;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   #region WinInet enumsDi2015NewLine   //Di2015NewLine   // options manifests for Internet{Query|Set}OptionDi2015NewLine   //Di2015NewLine   public enum InternetOption : uintDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      INTERNET_OPTION_PER_CONNECTION_OPTION = 75Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //Di2015NewLine   // Options used in INTERNET_PER_CONN_OPTON structDi2015NewLine   //Di2015NewLine   public enum PerConnOptionDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      INTERNET_PER_CONN_FLAGS = 1, // Sets or retrieves the connection type. The Value member will contain one or more of the values from PerConnFlags Di2015NewLine      INTERNET_PER_CONN_PROXY_SERVER = 2, // Sets or retrieves a string containing the proxy servers.  Di2015NewLine      INTERNET_PER_CONN_PROXY_BYPASS = 3, // Sets or retrieves a string containing the URLs that do not use the proxy server.  Di2015NewLine      INTERNET_PER_CONN_AUTOCONFIG_URL = 4//, // Sets or retrieves a string containing the URL to the automatic configuration script.  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //Di2015NewLine   // PER_CONN_FLAGSDi2015NewLine   //Di2015NewLine   [Flags]Di2015NewLine   public enum PerConnFlagsDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      PROXY_TYPE_DIRECT = 0x00000001,  // direct to netDi2015NewLine      PROXY_TYPE_PROXY = 0x00000002,  // via named proxyDi2015NewLine      PROXY_TYPE_AUTO_PROXY_URL = 0x00000004,  // autoproxy URLDi2015NewLine      PROXY_TYPE_AUTO_DETECT = 0x00000008   // use autoproxy detectionDi2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   internal static class NativeMethodsDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      [DllImport("WinInet.dll", SetLastError = true, CharSet = CharSet.Auto)]Di2015NewLine      [return: MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.Bool)]Di2015NewLine      public static extern bool InternetSetOption(IntPtr hInternet, InternetOption dwOption, IntPtr lpBuffer, int dwBufferLength);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20190314Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IList<DateTime> GetWeekDays(DateTime startDate, DayOfWeek day, int count, bool pastDays, bool includeStartDate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int start = (int)startDate.DayOfWeek;Di2015NewLine    int desired = (int)day;Di2015NewLine    int offset;Di2015NewLine    int diff = Math.Abs(start - desired);Di2015NewLine    if(!includeStartDate && start == desired)Di2015NewLine        diff = 7;Di2015NewLine    offset = pastDays ? (-1) * (7- diff) : diff;Di2015NewLine    int weekDays = pastDays ? (-1) * 7 : 7;Di2015NewLine    DateTime firstDay = startDate.AddDays(offset);Di2015NewLine    IList<DateTime> dates = Enumerable.Range(0, count)Di2015NewLine        .Select(i => firstDay.AddDays(i * weekDays))Di2015NewLine        .ToList();Di2015NewLine    return dates;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20200139Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> GroupWhile<T>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<T> source, Func<T, T, bool> predicate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var iterator = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<T> list = new List<T>() { iterator.Current };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        T previous = iterator.Current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (predicate(previous, iterator.Current))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                list.Add(iterator.Current);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return list;Di2015NewLine                list = new List<T>() { iterator.Current };Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            previous = iterator.Current;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        yield return list;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20201949Di2015UniqueSeparator// this generates all strings for characters 0-3 with lengths 2-3Di2015NewLineList<string> result = GenerateStrings("0123", 2, 3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate List<string> GenerateStrings(string allowedChars, int fromLength, int toLength)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<string> strings = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int charsNum = allowedChars.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int currentLength = fromLength; currentLength <= toLength; currentLength++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // initialize array of indexes to generate individual charactersDi2015NewLine        int[] indexes = new int[currentLength];Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(currentLength);Di2015NewLine            // generate characters based on current index valuesDi2015NewLine            for (int charPosition = 0; charPosition < currentLength; charPosition++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(allowedChars[indexes[charPosition]]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            strings.Add(sb.ToString());Di2015NewLine            // until we can increment indexes array (still some character combinations available)Di2015NewLine        } while (IncrementIndex(indexes, charsNum - 1, currentLength - 1));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return strings;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Have array of integer indexes such as [0,0,0] with valid values 0-9. Di2015NewLine/// This function increments indexes from right by one with correct overflow handling, Di2015NewLine/// such that value [0,0,3] is incremented to [0,0,4], value [0,2,9] to [0,3,0] etc.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>True if increment was successful, false if maximal value was reached.</returns>Di2015NewLineprivate bool IncrementIndex(int[] indexes, int maxItemValue, int incrementFromPosition)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    indexes[incrementFromPosition]++;Di2015NewLine    // check if current position overflow allowed rangeDi2015NewLine    if (indexes[incrementFromPosition] > maxItemValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (incrementFromPosition == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // we reached left-most position and can't increment moreDi2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        indexes[incrementFromPosition] = 0;Di2015NewLine        // increment next position to the leftDi2015NewLine        return IncrementIndex(indexes, maxItemValue, incrementFromPosition-1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20204056Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void GetVersionFromRegistry()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (RegistryKey ndpKey = RegistryKey.OpenBaseKey(RegistryHive.LocalMachine,Di2015NewLine        RegistryView.Registry32).OpenSubKey(@"SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\NET Framework Setup\\NDP\\"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (string versionKeyName in ndpKey.GetSubKeyNames())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (versionKeyName.StartsWith("v"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                RegistryKey versionKey = ndpKey.OpenSubKey(versionKeyName);Di2015NewLine                string name = (string)versionKey.GetValue("Version", "");Di2015NewLine                string sp = versionKey.GetValue("SP", "").ToString();Di2015NewLine                string install = versionKey.GetValue("Install", "").ToString();Di2015NewLine                if (install == "") //no install info, ust be laterDi2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine(versionKeyName + "  " + name);Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (sp != "" && install == "1")Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Console.WriteLine(versionKeyName + "  " + name + "  SP" + sp);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (name != "")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                foreach 20206611Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Rectangle GetDisplaySize()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Use xrandr to get size of screen located at offset (0,0).Di2015NewLine    System.Diagnostics.Process p = new System.Diagnostics.Process();Di2015NewLine    p.StartInfo.UseShellExecute = false;Di2015NewLine    p.StartInfo.RedirectStandardOutput = true;Di2015NewLine    p.StartInfo.FileName = "xrandr";Di2015NewLine    p.Start();Di2015NewLine    string output = p.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine    p.WaitForExit();Di2015NewLine    var match = System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Match(output, @"(\\d+)x(\\d+)\\+0\\+0");Di2015NewLine    var w = match.Groups[1].Value;Di2015NewLine    var h = match.Groups[2].Value;Di2015NewLine    Rectangle r;Di2015NewLine    r.Width = int.Parse(w);Di2015NewLine    r.Height = int.Parse(h);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine ("Display Size is {0} x {1}", w, h);Di2015NewLine    return r;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20215851Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunc<int, int, string>
20215851Di2015UniqueSeparatorDateTime
20215851Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunc<DateTime, string> formatting = dt => (...) // as aboveDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// define parameters for the lambda expressionDi2015NewLineParameterExpression monthParam = Expression.Parameter(typeof(int));Di2015NewLineParameterExpression dayParam = Expression.Parameter(typeof(int));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// look up DateTime constructorDi2015NewLineConstructorInfo ci = typeof(DateTime).GetConstructor(new Type[] { typeof(int), typeof(int), typeof(int) });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// look up string.ConcatDi2015NewLineMethodInfo concat = typeof(string).GetMethod("Concat", new Type[] { typeof(string), typeof(string), typeof(string) });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// inner call: formatting(new DateTime(2013, month, day))Di2015NewLinevar call = Expression.Call(formatting.Method, Expression.New(ci, Expression.Constant(2013), monthParam, dayParam));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// concat: "'" + call + "'"Di2015NewLinevar expr = Expression.Call(concat, Expression.Constant("'"), call, Expression.Constant("'"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// create the final lambda: (int, int) => exprDi2015NewLinevar lambda = Expression.Lambda<Func<int, int, string>>(expr, new ParameterExpression[] { monthParam, dayParam });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// compile and executeDi2015NewLineFunc<int, int, string> func = lambda.Compile();Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(func(2, 1)); // '01.02.2013 Hello!'Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(func(11, 26)); // '26.11.2013 Hello!'Di2015NewLine
20215851Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunc<DateTime, string> formatting = dt => dt.ToShortDateString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineParameterExpression param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(DateTime));Di2015NewLineMethodInfo concat = typeof(string).GetMethod("Concat", new Type[] { typeof(string), typeof(string), typeof(string) });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar call = Expression.Call(formatting.Method, param);Di2015NewLinevar expr = Expression.Call(concat, Expression.Constant("'"), call, Expression.Constant(" Hello!'"));Di2015NewLinevar lambda = Expression.Lambda<Func<DateTime, string>>(expr, new ParameterExpression[] { param });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFunc<DateTime, string> func = lambda.Compile();Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(func(new DateTime(2013, 02, 01)));Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(func(new DateTime(2013, 11, 26)));Di2015NewLine

Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine            else {Di2015NewLine                CancellationTokenRegistration registration = new CancellationTokenRegistration(); Di2015NewLine                if (cancellationToken.CanBeCanceled) {Di2015NewLine                    registration = cancellationToken.Register(() => completion.TrySetCanceled());Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                OpenAsyncRetry retry = new OpenAsyncRetry(this, completion, result, registration); 20235714Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Form1()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        DoubleBuffered = true;Di2015NewLine        FormBorderStyle = FormBorderStyle.None;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    protected override CreateParams CreateParamsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            const int CS_DROPSHADOW = 0x20000;Di2015NewLine            CreateParams cp = base.CreateParams;Di2015NewLine            cp.ClassStyle |= CS_DROPSHADOW;Di2015NewLine            return cp;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    protected override void WndProc(ref Message m)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (m.Msg == 0x84) //WM_NCHITTEST = 0x84Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int x = m.LParam.ToInt32() & 0xffff;Di2015NewLine            int y = m.LParam.ToInt32() >> 16;Di2015NewLine            int codex, codey;Di2015NewLine            Point p = PointToClient(new Point(x, y));Di2015NewLine            codey = p.Y < 5 ? 2 : p.Y > ClientSize.Height - 5 ? 1 : 0;Di2015NewLine            codex = p.X < 5 ? 2 : p.X > ClientSize.Width - 5 ? 1 : 0;Di2015NewLine            switch (codex + (codey<<2))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case 10://Top-LeftDi2015NewLine                    m.Result = (IntPtr)13;Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                case 8://TopDi2015NewLine                    m.Result = (IntPtr)12;Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                case 9://Top-RightDi2015NewLine                    m.Result = (IntPtr)14;Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                case 2://LeftDi2015NewLine                    m.Result = (IntPtr)10;Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                case 1://RightDi2015NewLine                    m.Result = (IntPtr)11;Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                case 6://Bottom-LeftDi2015NewLine                    m.Result = (IntPtr)16;Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                case 4://BottomDi2015NewLine                    m.Result = (IntPtr)15;Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                case 5://Bottom-Right;Di2015NewLine                    m.Result = (IntPtr)17;Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine            }                Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        base.WndProc(ref m);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

"GCT",Di2015NewLine                "GCC", "GCA", "GCG", "GAT", "GAC", "GAA", "GAG", "GGT", "GGC",Di2015NewLine                "GGA", "GGG", };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static string[] AMINOS_PER_CODON = { Di2015NewLine            "F", "F", "L", "L", "S", "S",Di2015NewLine            "S", "S", "Y", "Y", "C", "C", "W", "L", "L", "L", "L", "P", "P",Di2015NewLine            "P", "P", "H", "H", "Q", "Q", "R", "R", "R", "R", "I", "I", "I",Di2015NewLine            "M", "T", "T", "T", "T", "N", "N", "K", "K", "S", "S", "R", "R",Di2015NewLine            "V", "V", "V", "V", "A", "A", "A", "A", "D", "D", "E", "E", "G",Di2015NewLine            "G", "G", "G", };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static string[] AMINO_ABBREVIATIONS = {Di2015NewLine            "F", "L", "I", "M", "V",Di2015NewLine            "S", "P", "T", "A", "Y", "H", "Q", "N", "K", "D", "E", "C", "W",Di2015NewLine            "R", "G" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static string[] FULL_NAMES = { Di2015NewLine            "phenylalanine", "leucine",Di2015NewLine            "isoleucine", "methionine", "valine", "serine", "proline",Di2015NewLine            "threonine", "alanine", "tyrosine", "histidine", "glutamine",Di2015NewLine            "asparagine", "lysine", "aspartic acid", "glutamic acid",Di2015NewLine            "cysteine", "tryptophan", "arginine", "glycine" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static string DNAComplement(string dna)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            char[] array = dna.ToCharArray();Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < array.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                char let = array[i];Di2015NewLine                if (let == 'A') array[i] = 'T';Di2015NewLine                else if (let == 'T') array[i] = 'A';Di2015NewLine                else if (let == 'C') array[i] = 'G';Di2015NewLine                else if (let == 'G') array[i] = 'C';Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Array.Reverse(array);Di2015NewLine            return new string(array);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static string StringToAminoAcid(String input)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string result = "";Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < input.Length; i += 3)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result += codonToAminoAcid(input.Substring(i, 3));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static string codonToAminoAcid(String codon)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int k = 0; k < CODONS.Length; k++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (CODONS[k].Equals(codon))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return AMINOS_PER_CODON[k];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // never reach here with valid codonDi2015NewLine            return "X";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //then input is DNADi2015NewLine            string dna = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //The given peptide Di2015NewLine            string givenPeptide = "KEVFEPHYY";Di2015NewLine            int resultCount = 0;Di2015NewLine            int candidateLength = givenPeptide.Length * 3;Di2015NewLine            string forward = "";Di2015NewLine            string backward = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int pos = 0; pos < dna.Length - candidateLength + 1; pos++)  // Added the "+ 1"Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                forward = dna.Substring(pos, candidateLength);Di2015NewLine                backward = DNAComplement(forward);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Unremark to get a glimpse into what is happening...Di2015NewLine                //Console.WriteLine("pos: {0}, forward: {1}, backward: {2}, forwardTranslation: {3}, backwardTranslation: {4}",Di2015NewLine                //    pos, forward, backward, StringToAminoAcid(forward), StringToAminoAcid(backward));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (Di2015NewLine                    (StringToAminoAcid(forward) == givenPeptide)Di2015NewLine                    ||Di2015NewLine                    (StringToAminoAcid(backward) == givenPeptide)Di2015NewLine                  )Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    resultCount++;Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine(String.Format("Result {0,3} at position {1,6}... {2}", resultCount, pos, forward));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Done");Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        }//end mainDi2015NewLine    }//end classDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20253825Di2015UniqueSeparatorCombine
20253825Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Expression<Func<TFirstParam, TResult>>Di2015NewLine    Combine<TFirstParam, TIntermediate, TResult>(Di2015NewLine    this Expression<Func<TFirstParam, TIntermediate>> first,Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<TFirstParam, TIntermediate, TResult>> second)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TFirstParam), "param");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var newFirst = first.Body.Replace(first.Parameters[0], param);Di2015NewLine    var newSecond = second.Body.Replace(second.Parameters[0], param)Di2015NewLine        .Replace(second.Parameters[1], newFirst);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<TFirstParam, TResult>>(newSecond, param);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
