20254043Di2015UniqueSeparatorSELECT pg_catalog.pg_get_function_arguments('foobar'::regproc);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSELECT pg_catalog.pg_get_functiondef('foobar'::regproc);Di2015NewLine
20254043Di2015UniqueSeparatordenis=# select pg_get_function_arguments('defproc'::regproc);Di2015NewLine pg_get_function_arguments Di2015NewLine---------------------------Di2015NewLine _proc regprocedureDi2015NewLine(1 row)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedenis=# select pg_get_functiondef('defproc'::regproc);Di2015NewLine                                           pg_get_functiondef                                            Di2015NewLine---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.defproc(_proc regprocedure)Di2015NewLine  RETURNS textDi2015NewLine  LANGUAGE plpgsqlDi2015NewLine  STABLE STRICTDi2015NewLine  SET search_path TO "$user",publicDi2015NewLine AS $function$Di2015NewLine DECLAREDi2015NewLine     _def        text;Di2015NewLine     _eol        text;Di2015NewLine     _unindent   text;Di2015NewLine     _untabbed   text;Di2015NewLine     line        text;Di2015NewLine     pos         int; Di2015NewLine BEGINDi2015NewLine     _def := pg_get_functiondef($1);Di2015NewLine     _eol := (regexp_matches(_def, E'\\\\r?\\\\n'))[1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     _unindent := (regexp_matches(_def, _eol || E'AS\\\\s*\\\\$(?:functionx*)\\\\$' || _eol || E'(\\\\t*)'))[1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     IF  _unindent <> ''Di2015NewLine     THENDi2015NewLine         _def := regexp_replace(_def, '^' || _unindent, '', 'gn');Di2015NewLine     END IF;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     FOR line INDi2015NewLine     SELECT  regexp_split_to_table(_def, _eol) as lineDi2015NewLine     LOOPDi2015NewLine         line = trim(trailing E' \\t' from line);Di2015NewLine         LOOPDi2015NewLine             pos := position(E'\\t' in line);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine             IF  pos = 0Di2015NewLine             THENDi2015NewLine                 EXIT;Di2015NewLine             END IF;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine             line := substring(line from 1 for pos - 1) ||Di2015NewLine                     repeat(' ', 4 - (pos % 4)) ||Di2015NewLine                     substring(line from pos + 1 for length(line));Di2015NewLine         END LOOP;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         _untabbed := COALESCE(_untabbed || _eol, '') || line;Di2015NewLine     END LOOP;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     RETURN _untabbed;Di2015NewLine END;Di2015NewLine $function$Di2015NewLine(1 row)Di2015NewLine

20257164Di2015UniqueSeparator    public ArrayList GetTables()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ArrayList list = new ArrayList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // executes query that select names of all tables in master table of the databaseDi2015NewLine            String query = "SELECT name FROM sqlite_master " +Di2015NewLine                    "WHERE type = 'table'" +Di2015NewLine                    "ORDER BY 1";Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            DataTable table = GetDataTable(query);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Return all table names in the ArrayListDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (DataRow row in table.Rows)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                list.Add(row.ItemArray[0].ToString());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(e.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return list;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DataTable GetDataTable(string sql)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DataTable dt = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine            using (var c = new SQLiteConnection(dbConnection))Di2015NewLine Console.WriteLine(e.Message);Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

20260952Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void ConvertToIBANAccount(string fileName,string outFileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var client = new WebService.BANBICSoapClient("IBANBICSoap"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StreamReader sr = new StreamReader(fileName);Di2015NewLine            StreamWriter sw = new StreamWriter(outFileName);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Bezig met converteren....");Di2015NewLine            while (sr.Peek() >= 0) Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine            string line = sr.ReadLine(); Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string[] rowsArray = line.Split(';');Di2015NewLine                    line = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine                    string account = rowsArray[0];Di2015NewLine                    string relationID = rowsArray[1];Di2015NewLine                    string resultIBAN = client.BBANtoIBAN(account);Di2015NewLine                    string resultBIC = client.BBANtoBIC(account);Di2015NewLine                    if (resultIBAN != string.Empty && resultBIC != string.Empty)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        line = account + ";" + resultIBAN +";" + resultBIC + ";" + relationID;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        line = account + ";" + "0" + ";" + "0" + ";" + relationID;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception msg)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine(msg);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            sw.WriteLine(line) ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            sr.Close();Di2015NewLine            sw.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Conversie succesvol");Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20274223Di2015UniqueSeparator#include <iostream>Di2015NewLine#include <algorithm>Di2015NewLine#include <numeric>Di2015NewLine#include <vector>Di2015NewLine#include <cstdlib>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine        const int numbers[] = { 500, 450, 455, 700, 800, 123, 234, 345, 456, 567, 678, 789, 890, 901, 854, 365, 785, 987, 876, 765, 654, 543, 432, 321};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        const std::size_t n = sizeof(numbers) / sizeof(*numbers);Di2015NewLine        const std::size_t r = 10;Di2015NewLine        const int targetSum = 4500;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        std::vector<int> numvec(&numbers[0], &numbers[n]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        std::vector<bool> indices(n);Di2015NewLine        std::fill(indices.begin() + n - r, indices.end(), true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int bestDelta = targetSum;Di2015NewLine        std::vector<int> bestCombination;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        do {Di2015NewLine                std::vector<int> combination;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (std::size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i) {Di2015NewLine                        if (indices[i]) {Di2015NewLine                                combination.push_back(numvec.at(i));Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int sum = std::accumulate(combination.begin(), combination.end(), 0);Di2015NewLine                int delta = abs(sum - targetSum);Di2015NewLine                if (delta < bestDelta) {Di2015NewLine                        bestDelta = delta;Di2015NewLine                        bestCombination = combination;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        for (std::vector<int>::const_iterator it = combination.begin(), end = combination.end(); it != end; ++it) {Di2015NewLine                                if (it != combination.begin()) {Di2015NewLine                                        std::cout << "+";Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                                std::cout << *it;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        std::cout << "=" << sum << std::endl;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (sum == targetSum) {Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine        } while (std::next_permutation(indices.begin(), indices.end()));Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20279277Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Task Run(Func<Task> function, CancellationToken cancellationToken)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (function == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("function");Di2015NewLine      cancellationToken.ThrowIfSourceDisposed();Di2015NewLine      if (cancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested)Di2015NewLine        return Task.FromCancellation(cancellationToken);Di2015NewLine      elseDi2015NewLine        return (Task) new UnwrapPromise<VoidTaskResult>((Task) Task<Task>.Factory.StartNew(function, cancellationToken, TaskCreationOptions.DenyChildAttach, TaskScheduler.Default), true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

20279286Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class ExceptionDispatchInfoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    readonly Exception _exception;Di2015NewLine    readonly object _source;Di2015NewLine    readonly string _stackTrace;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const BindingFlags PrivateInstance = BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.NonPublic;Di2015NewLine    static readonly FieldInfo RemoteStackTrace = typeof(Exception).GetField("_remoteStackTraceString", PrivateInstance);Di2015NewLine    static readonly FieldInfo Source = typeof(Exception).GetField("_source", PrivateInstance);Di2015NewLine    static readonly MethodInfo InternalPreserveStackTrace = typeof(Exception).GetMethod("InternalPreserveStackTrace", PrivateInstance);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private ExceptionDispatchInfo(Exception source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _exception = source;Di2015NewLine        _stackTrace = _exception.StackTrace + Environment.NewLine;Di2015NewLine        _source = Source.GetValue(_exception);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Exception SourceException { get { return _exception; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static ExceptionDispatchInfo Capture(Exception source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (source == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("source");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new ExceptionDispatchInfo(source);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Throw()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw _exception;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            InternalPreserveStackTrace.Invoke(_exception, new object[0]);Di2015NewLine            RemoteStackTrace.SetValue(_exception, _stackTrace);Di2015NewLine            Source.SetValue(_exception, _source);Di2015NewLine            throw;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20284635Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class HttpUtilityDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static HttpValueCollection ParseQueryString(string query)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (query == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("query");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if ((query.Length > 0) && (query[0] == '?'))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            query = query.Substring(1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new HttpValueCollection(query, true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic sealed class HttpValueDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public HttpValue()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public HttpValue(string key, string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Key = key;Di2015NewLine        this.Value = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string Key { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Value { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class HttpValueCollection : List<HttpValue>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    #region ConstructorsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public HttpValueCollection()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public HttpValueCollection(string query)Di2015NewLine        : this(query, true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public HttpValueCollection(string query, bool urlencoded)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(query))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.FillFromString(query, urlencoded);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region ParametersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string this[string key]Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return this.First(x => string.Equals(x.Key, key, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase)).Value; }Di2015NewLine        set { this.First(x => string.Equals(x.Key, key, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase)).Value = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Public MethodsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(string key, string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Add(new HttpValue(key, value));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool ContainsKey(string key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this.Any(x => string.Equals(x.Key, key, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string[] GetValues(string key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this.Where(x => string.Equals(x.Key, key, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase)).Select(x => x.Value).ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Remove(string key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.RemoveAll(x => string.Equals(x.Key, key, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this.ToString(true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public virtual string ToString(bool urlencoded)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this.ToString(urlencoded, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public virtual string ToString(bool urlencoded, IDictionary excludeKeys)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (this.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder stringBuilder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (HttpValue item in this)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string key = item.Key;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if ((excludeKeys == null) || !excludeKeys.Contains(key))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string value = item.Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (urlencoded)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    key = Uri.EscapeDataString(key);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (stringBuilder.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    stringBuilder.Append('&');Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                stringBuilder.Append((key != null) ? (key + "=") : string.Empty);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if ((value != null) && (value.Length > 0))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (urlencoded)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        value = Uri.EscapeDataString(value);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    stringBuilder.Append(value);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return stringBuilder.ToString();Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Private MethodsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void FillFromString(string query, bool urlencoded)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int num = (query != null) ? query.Length : 0;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < num; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int startIndex = i;Di2015NewLine            int num4 = -1;Di2015NewLine            while (i < num)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                char ch = query[i];Di2015NewLine                if (ch == '=')Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (num4 < 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        num4 = i;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (ch == '&')Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                i++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            string str = null;Di2015NewLine            string str2 = null;Di2015NewLine            if (num4 >= 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                str = query.Substring(startIndex, num4 - startIndex);Di2015NewLine                str2 = query.Substring(num4 + 1, (i - num4) - 1);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                str2 = query.Substring(startIndex, i - startIndex);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (urlencoded)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.Add(Uri.UnescapeDataString(str), Uri.UnescapeDataString(str2));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.Add(str, str2);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if ((i == (num - 1)) && (query[i] == '&'))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.Add(null, string.Empty);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20284708Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string FormatStringByIndex(object field, int index)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (index > 0 && index < 3)Di2015NewLine        return string.Format("{0:yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.fffffff}", field);}Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        return field.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineStringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLinevar columnNames = dt.Columns.Cast<DataColumn>().Select(column => "\\"" + column.ColumnName.Replace("\\"", "\\"\\"") + "\\"").ToArray();Di2015NewLinesb.AppendLine(string.Join(",", columnNames));Di2015NewLineforeach (DataRow row in dt.Rows)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   var fields =   row.ItemArray.Select((field, index) => "\\"" + FormatStringByIndex(field, index).Replace("\\"", "\\"\\"") + "\\"").ToArray();Di2015NewLine   sb.AppendLine(string.Join(",", fields));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20286713Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Concurrent;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading.Tasks;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace SimpleProducerConsumerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Main thread id is {0}.", Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (var blockingCollection = new BlockingCollection<Action>())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Start our processing loop.Di2015NewLine                var actionLoop = new Thread(() =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine(Di2015NewLine                        "Starting action loop on thread {0} (dedicated action loop thread).",Di2015NewLine                        Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId,Di2015NewLine                        Thread.CurrentThread.IsThreadPoolThread);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Dequeue actions as they become available.Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var action in blockingCollection.GetConsumingEnumerable())Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Invoke the action synchronouslyDi2015NewLine                        // on the "actionLoop" thread.Di2015NewLine                        action();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Action loop terminating.");Di2015NewLine                });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                actionLoop.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Enqueue some work.Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Enqueueing action 1 from thread {0} (main thread).", Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId);Di2015NewLine                blockingCollection.Add(() => SimulateWork(1));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Enqueueing action 2 from thread {0} (main thread).", Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId);Di2015NewLine                blockingCollection.Add(() => SimulateWork(2));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Let's enqueue it from another thread just for fun.Di2015NewLine                var enqueueTask = Task.Factory.StartNew(() =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine(Di2015NewLine                        "Enqueueing action 3 from thread {0} (task executing on a thread pool thread).",Di2015NewLine                        Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    blockingCollection.Add(() => SimulateWork(3));Di2015NewLine                });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // We have to wait for the task to completeDi2015NewLine                // because otherwise we'll end up callingDi2015NewLine                // CompleteAdding before our background taskDi2015NewLine                // has had the chance to enqueue action #3.Di2015NewLine                enqueueTask.Wait();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Tell our loop (and, consequently, the "actionLoop" thread)Di2015NewLine                // to terminate when it's done processing pending actions.Di2015NewLine                blockingCollection.CompleteAdding();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Done enqueueing work. Waiting for the loop to complete.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Block until the "actionLoop" thread terminates.Di2015NewLine                actionLoop.Join();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Done. Press Enter to quit.");Di2015NewLine                Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void SimulateWork(int actionNo)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(500);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Finished processing action {0} on thread {1} (dedicated action loop thread).", actionNo, Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20287985Di2015UniqueSeparator^([A-Z][a-z]*\\.)+$Di2015NewLine
20287985Di2015UniqueSeparatorThe regular expression:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine(?-imsx:^([A-Z][a-z]*\\.)+$)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinematches as follows:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineNODE                     EXPLANATIONDi2015NewLine----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine(?-imsx:                 group, but do not capture (case-sensitive)Di2015NewLine                         (with ^ and $ matching normally) (with . notDi2015NewLine                         matching \\n) (matching whitespace and #Di2015NewLine                         normally):Di2015NewLine----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine  ^                        the beginning of the stringDi2015NewLine----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine  (                        group and capture to \\1 (1 or more timesDi2015NewLine                           (matching the most amount possible)):Di2015NewLine----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine    [A-Z]                    any character of: 'A' to 'Z'Di2015NewLine----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine    [a-z]*                   any character of: 'a' to 'z' (0 or moreDi2015NewLine                             times (matching the most amountDi2015NewLine                             possible))Di2015NewLine----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine    \\.                       '.'Di2015NewLine----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine  )+                       end of \\1 (NOTE: because you are using aDi2015NewLine                           quantifier on this capture, only the LASTDi2015NewLine                           repetition of the captured pattern will beDi2015NewLine                           stored in \\1)Di2015NewLine----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine  $                        before an optional \\n, and the end of theDi2015NewLine                           stringDi2015NewLine----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine)                        end of groupingDi2015NewLine----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine

20290804Di2015UniqueSeparator//These are not default imports, so you need to use itDi2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Cryptography;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Before your actual class, you need to make your custom 512Di2015NewLinepublic class BillieJeansSHA512 : HMACDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public BillieJeansSHA512(byte[] key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HashName = "System.Security.Cryptography.SHA512CryptoServiceProvider";Di2015NewLine        HashSizeValue = 512;Di2015NewLine        BlockSizeValue = 128;Di2015NewLine        Key = (byte[])key.Clone();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Now, there's your actual classDi2015NewLinepublic class HelloWorld{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //First, use this method to convert byte to String like a bossDi2015NewLine    static string ByteToString(byte[] buff)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string sbinary = "";Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < buff.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            sbinary += buff[i].ToString("x2"); /* hex format */Di2015NewLine        return sbinary;Di2015NewLine    }    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Now let's get it started!Di2015NewLine    public static void Main(String []args){Di2015NewLine        System.Text.UTF8Encoding encoding = new System.Text.UTF8Encoding();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Your dataDi2015NewLine        var apiSecret = "5432919427bd18884fc2a6e48b65dfba48fd9a1a46e3468b52fadbc6d6b463425";Di2015NewLine        var data = "payment_currency=USD&group_orders=0&count=100&nonce=1385689989977529";Di2015NewLine        var endPoint = "/info/orderbook";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        String message = endPoint + Convert.ToChar(0) + data;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Hash will be stored hereDi2015NewLine        String hash = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //put your key at your custom 512Di2015NewLine        BillieJeansSHA512 hmacsha512 = new BillieJeansSHA512(encoding.GetBytes(apiSecret));Di2015NewLine        //hash'em allDi2015NewLine        byte[] result = hmacsha512.ComputeHash(encoding.GetBytes(message));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //convert bytes to stringDi2015NewLine        hash = ByteToString(result);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //See it :)Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(hash);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Or if you using it at a web-page, this is it.Di2015NewLine        //Response.Write(hash)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Now the easy part, convert it to base64Di2015NewLine        var bytesTo64 = System.Text.Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(hash);Di2015NewLine        String hash64 = System.Convert.ToBase64String(bytesTo64);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20291166Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate async void SaveColorArray(string filename, Color[] array)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StorageFile sampleFile = await Windows.Storage.ApplicationData.Current.LocalFolder.CreateFileAsync(filename + ".dat", CreationCollisionOption.ReplaceExisting);Di2015NewLine    IRandomAccessStream writeStream = await sampleFile.OpenAsync(FileAccessMode.ReadWrite);Di2015NewLine    IOutputStream outputSteam = writeStream.GetOutputStreamAt(0);Di2015NewLine    DataWriter dataWriter = new DataWriter(outputSteam);Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < array.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        dataWriter.WriteByte(array[i].R);Di2015NewLine        dataWriter.WriteByte(array[i].G);Di2015NewLine        dataWriter.WriteByte(array[i].B);Di2015NewLine        dataWriter.WriteByte(array[i].A);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    await dataWriter.StoreAsync();Di2015NewLine    await outputSteam.FlushAsync();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected async Task<Color[]> LoadColorArray(string filename)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StorageFile sampleFile = await Windows.Storage.ApplicationData.Current.LocalFolder.CreateFileAsync(filename + ".dat", CreationCollisionOption.OpenIfExists);Di2015NewLine    IRandomAccessStream readStream = await sampleFile.OpenAsync(FileAccessMode.Read);Di2015NewLine    IInputStream inputSteam = readStream.GetInputStreamAt(0);Di2015NewLine    DataReader dataReader = new DataReader(inputSteam);Di2015NewLine    await dataReader.LoadAsync((uint)readStream.Size);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Color[] levelArray = new Color[dataReader.UnconsumedBufferLength / 4];Di2015NewLine    int i = 0;Di2015NewLine    while (dataReader.UnconsumedBufferLength > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] colorArray = new byte[4];Di2015NewLine        dataReader.ReadBytes(colorArray);Di2015NewLine        levelArray[i++] = new Color(colorArray[0], colorArray[1], colorArray[2], colorArray[3]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return levelArray;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20291935Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE FUNCTION [DelimitedSplit8K]Di2015NewLine--===== Define I/O parametersDi2015NewLine        (@pString VARCHAR(8000), @pDelimiter CHAR(1))Di2015NewLineRETURNS TABLE WITH SCHEMABINDING ASDi2015NewLine RETURNDi2015NewLine--===== "Inline" CTE Driven "Tally Table" produces values from 0 up to 10,000...Di2015NewLine     -- enough to cover VARCHAR(8000)Di2015NewLine  WITH E1(N) AS (Di2015NewLine                 SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL Di2015NewLine                 SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL Di2015NewLine                 SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1Di2015NewLine                ),                          --10E+1 or 10 rowsDi2015NewLine       E2(N) AS (SELECT 1 FROM E1 a, E1 b), --10E+2 or 100 rowsDi2015NewLine       E4(N) AS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 a, E2 b), --10E+4 or 10,000 rows maxDi2015NewLine cteTally(N) AS (--==== This provides the "zero base" and limits the number of rows right up frontDi2015NewLine                     -- for both a performance gain and prevention of accidental "overruns"Di2015NewLine                 SELECT 0 UNION ALLDi2015NewLine                 SELECT TOP (DATALENGTH(ISNULL(@pString,1))) ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) FROM E4Di2015NewLine                ),Di2015NewLinecteStart(N1) AS (--==== This returns N+1 (starting position of each "element" just once for each delimiter)Di2015NewLine                 SELECT t.N+1Di2015NewLine                   FROM cteTally tDi2015NewLine                  WHERE (SUBSTRING(@pString,t.N,1) = @pDelimiter OR t.N = 0) Di2015NewLine                )Di2015NewLine--===== Do the actual split. The ISNULL/NULLIF combo handles the length for the final element when no delimiter is found.Di2015NewLine SELECT ItemNumber = ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY s.N1),Di2015NewLine        Item       = SUBSTRING(@pString,s.N1,ISNULL(NULLIF(CHARINDEX(@pDelimiter,@pString,s.N1),0)-s.N1,8000))Di2015NewLine   FROM cteStart sDi2015NewLineGODi2015NewLine
20291935Di2015UniqueSeparatorSELECT somecolumn FROM sometable tDi2015NewLineINNER JOIN [DelimitedSplit8K](@DelimitedString, ',') v ON v.Item = t.somecolumnDi2015NewLine

20293734Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Form1()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  TypeText("this is a text");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void TypeText(string text)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  textBox1.Clear(); // Make sure the textbox is emptyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Thread thread = new Thread(delegate() // Create a new thread which fills the textbox periodicallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      button1.BeginInvoke((MethodInvoker)delegate { button1.Enabled = false; }); // Disables the buttonDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      for (int i = 0; i < text.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        int temp = i; // Cache variable because without this, an 'ArgumentOutOfRange' Exception will be thrownDi2015NewLine        textBox1.BeginInvoke((MethodInvoker)delegate // Invoke to main threadDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          textBox1.Text += text[temp]; // Fill with next charDi2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (text[temp] != ' ') // This makes sure the user doesn't have to wait the double of the time when there is an empty space for the new characterDi2015NewLine          Thread.Sleep(500); // This will stop the seperate thread for 500ms. Won't block the main threadDi2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      button1.BeginInvoke((MethodInvoker)delegate { button1.Enabled = true; }); // Reenables the button    Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  thread.Start(); // Start the new thread and continue the main threadDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20293868Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T GetByType<T> (string input) {Di2015NewLine    if(typeof(T) == typeof(string)) { return (T) Convert.ChangeType(input, typeof(T)); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if(typeof(T) == typeof(Int32)) { Di2015NewLine        int output;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(int.TryParse(input, out output)) { return (T) Convert.ChangeType(output, typeof(T)); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if(typeof(T) == typeof(bool)) {Di2015NewLine        return (T) Convert.ChangeType(input == "1", typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    throw new ArgumentException("Invalid input");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20302070Di2015UniqueSeparator                    //receive UDP packetDi2015NewLine                    int port = (int)float.Parse(Variables.port_key);Di2015NewLine                    UdpCient UDP_packet = new UdpClient(port);Di2015NewLine                    UDP_packet.EnableBroadcast = true;Di2015NewLine                    IPEndPoint RemoteIpEndPoint = new IPEndPoint(IPAddress.Any, 0);Di2015NewLine                    IPAddress from_addr = null;Di2015NewLine                    Boolean gogo = false;Di2015NewLine                    while (!gogo)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Byte[] receiveBytes = UDP_packet.Receive(ref RemoteIpEndPoint);Di2015NewLine                        string returnData = Encoding.UTF8.GetString(receiveBytes);Di2015NewLine                        if (returnData.ToString() == "83hcX1")Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            gogo = true;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        from_addr = RemoteIpEndPoint.Address;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    //send UDP packetDi2015NewLine                    IPEndPoint ipEndPoint = new IPEndPoint(from_addr, port);Di2015NewLine                    Byte[] sendBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes("94dbF5");Di2015NewLine                    UDP_packet.Send(sendBytes, sendBytes.Length, ipEndPoint);Di2015NewLine                    UDP_packet.Close();Di2015NewLine
20302070Di2015UniqueSeparator                        //send UDP packetDi2015NewLine                        DatagramSocket UDP_packet = new DatagramSocket(SERVERPORT);Di2015NewLine                        UDP_packet.setBroadcast(true);Di2015NewLine                        byte[] b = "83hcX1".getBytes("UTF-8");Di2015NewLine                        DatagramPacket outgoing = new DatagramPacket(b, b.length, getBroadcastAddress(Main.this), SERVERPORT);                  Di2015NewLine                        UDP_packet.send(outgoing);Di2015NewLine                        //receive UDP packetDi2015NewLine                        boolean gogo = false;Di2015NewLine                        while (!gogo) {                     Di2015NewLine                            byte[] buffer = new byte[1024];Di2015NewLine                            DatagramPacket incoming = new DatagramPacket(buffer, buffer.length);    Di2015NewLine                            UDP_packet.receive(incoming);Di2015NewLine                            String message = new String(incoming.getData(), 0, incoming.getLength(), "UTF-8");Di2015NewLine                             if (message.equals("94dbF5")) {Di2015NewLine                                 gogo = true;Di2015NewLine                                 SERVER_IP = incoming.getAddress();Di2015NewLine                             }                  Di2015NewLine                        }               Di2015NewLine                        UDP_packet.close();Di2015NewLine
20302070Di2015UniqueSeparatorInetAddress getBroadcastAddress(Context context) throws IOException {Di2015NewLine        WifiManager wifi = (WifiManager) context.getSystemService(Context.WIFI_SERVICE);Di2015NewLine        DhcpInfo dhcp = wifi.getDhcpInfo();Di2015NewLine        if (dhcp == null) {Di2015NewLine              return null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        int broadcast = (dhcp.ipAddress & dhcp.netmask) | ~dhcp.netmask;Di2015NewLine        byte[] quads = new byte[4];Di2015NewLine        for (int k = 0; k < 4; k++)Di2015NewLine          quads[k] = (byte) ((broadcast >> k * 8) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLine        return InetAddress.getByAddress(quads);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

20302217Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void ProcessWithSharpZipLib()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = new byte[4096];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ICSharpCode.SharpZipLib.Zip.ZipOutputStream zipOutputStream = new ICSharpCode.SharpZipLib.Zip.ZipOutputStream(Response.OutputStream);Di2015NewLine    zipOutputStream.SetLevel(0); //0-9, 9 being the highest level of compressionDi2015NewLine    zipOutputStream.UseZip64 = ICSharpCode.SharpZipLib.Zip.UseZip64.Off;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (KeyValuePair<string, string> fileNamePair in urls)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (WebClient wc = new WebClient())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (Stream wcStream = wc.OpenRead(GetUrlForEntryName(fileNamePair.Key)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ICSharpCode.SharpZipLib.Zip.ZipEntry entry = new ICSharpCode.SharpZipLib.Zip.ZipEntry(ICSharpCode.SharpZipLib.Zip.ZipEntry.CleanName(fileNamePair.Key));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                zipOutputStream.PutNextEntry(entry);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int count = wcStream.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                while (count > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    zipOutputStream.Write(buffer, 0, count);Di2015NewLine                    count = wcStream.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                    if (!Response.IsClientConnected)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    Response.Flush();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    zipOutputStream.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Response.Flush();Di2015NewLine    Response.End();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20303267Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static  MvcHtmlString ActionBaseRole(this HtmlHelper value, string actionName, string controllerName, object routeValues , IPrincipal user)Di2015NewLine {     Di2015NewLine   bool userHasRequeredRole = false;Di2015NewLine   Type t = Type.GetType((string.Format("MyProject.Controllers.{0}Controller",controllerName))); // MyProject.Controllers... replace on you namespaceDi2015NewLine   MethodInfo method = t.GetMethod(actionName);Di2015NewLine   var attr = (method.GetCustomAttribute(typeof(AuthorizeAttribute), true) as AuthorizeAttribute);Di2015NewLine   if (attr != null)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      string[] methodRequeredRoles = attr.Roles.Split(',');Di2015NewLine      userHasRequeredRole = methodRequeredRoles.Any(r => user.IsInRole(r.Trim())); // user roles check in depends on implementation authorization in you site  Di2015NewLine                                                                                            // In a simple version that might look like                                                                         Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   else userHasRequeredRole = true; //method don't have Authorize AttributeDi2015NewLine   return userHasRequeredRole ? value.Action(actionName, controllerName, routeValues) : MvcHtmlString.Empty; Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

20303728Di2015UniqueSeparatorBackgroundWorker
20303728Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool _isWorking = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Form1()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        backgroundWorker1.DoWork += backgroundWorker1_DoWork;Di2015NewLine        backgroundWorker1.RunWorkerCompleted += backgroundWorker1_RunWorkerCompleted;Di2015NewLine        backgroundWorker1.WorkerSupportsCancellation = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_isWorking)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Cancel the workerDi2015NewLine            backgroundWorker1.CancelAsync();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            button1.Enabled = false;Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        _isWorking = true;Di2015NewLine        button1.Text = "Cancel";Di2015NewLine        backgroundWorker1.RunWorkerAsync();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void backgroundWorker1_DoWork(object sender, DoWorkEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < 10; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (backgroundWorker1.CancellationPending) { return; }Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        e.Result = "SomeResult";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void backgroundWorker1_RunWorkerCompleted(object sender, RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _isWorking = false;Di2015NewLine        button1.Enabled = true;Di2015NewLine        button1.Text = "Run";Di2015NewLine        if (e.Cancelled) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Some type checkingDi2015NewLine        string theResult = e.Result as string;Di2015NewLine        if (theResult == null) return;
